answers.answer: Hi,Trulicity indirectly reduces blood sugar.What other meds are you taking.  If it is being taken with insulin or sulfonurea drugs, the dosage of those may need to be reduced.A blood sugar of 68 is actually low normal, and may not be a concern if it does not drop lower.Recommend you discuss your experience, your diabetes care, and whether adjustment of your medications is recommended with your Dr.

question: Is anyone taking this Med? It dropped my sugar level to 68 while sleeping .
title: Trulicity
